text: Follow the Fleet is a 1936 American musical comedy movie directed by Mark Sandrich and was based on the 1922 play Shore Leave by Hubert Osborne. It stars Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Tony Martin, Randolph Scott, Betty Grable, Lucille Ball, Astrid Allwyn, Doris Lloyd and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Mark Sandrich
title: Follow the Fleet
